result.execSummary:
The defendant Rickie Lamont Wade was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Rickie Lamont Wade is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Rickie Lamont Wade was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "B"], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: Domestic Abuse - Infliction of Physical Pain or Injury

supervisions.notes:
IMPOSED/STAYED.
If revoked Court authorizes Huber for work and education.

Court dismisses Counts 2 and 3.
Defendant to report to Probation today October 15, 2015.


In the event that the defendant is revoked or discharged from either probation or extended supervision with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victim(s) and/or governmental entities for any balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Evenson. ADA: Michael Edward Nieskes DF ATTY: Alex Andrea DF: Rickie Lamont Wade appeared. Case called at   Includes 15CF371, 15CF329. ADA Nieskes updates the court. Atty. Andrea agrees. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads NC to Ct 3  removing the domestic enhancer in 15CF329 and NC to the amended charge amending to a misdemeanor bail jumping in 15CF371. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 3  in  15CF329 removing the domestic enhancer and guilty of amended misdemanor bail jumping  in 15CF371 . On motion of the State, Crt dismisses Ct 1 and 2 in 15CF329. Sentencing arguments. DE is on probation in MN.Crt orders:
In 15CF329 Sentence I/S 30 days St. Croix County Jail. 
If revoked Court authorizes Huber for work and education. 
1 year probation with conditions: 
Court notes 8 days credit.
- Costs and costs of supervision
- Submit DNA sample and pay surcharge.
- Apply bond on file. 
- DE to have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Ms. Hayes.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  
- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times . This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.
- Domestic violence assessment. 
- Not to enter any business or establishment where the primary purpose is sale of alcohol.

In 15CF371 Sentence I/S 5 months St. Croix County Jail concurrent.
1 year probation with same conditions as 15CF329  to run concurrent.
Court notes 21 days credit.
- Costs

DE to report to probation today.
Pre-trial conference at 10-15-2015 11:15 am

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Evenson. ADA: Edward Minser DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski  DF ATTY: Alex Andrea DF:  Rickie Lamont Wade appeared. Case called at 10:09. Includes 15CF329 (PTC) and 15CF371 (ARGN).  On 15CF371 Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.  Waives speedy trial. Atty. Andrea requests a PTC for both files. ADA McKinley agrees. Address confirmed. Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 14, 2015 at 10:30 am.

*AMENDED*

-It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Jona H.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

-Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.

Further, it is ordered that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis Stats.

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Rohan. ADA:  Michael Edward Nieskes   DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea and John Kucinski  DF:  Rickie Lamont Wade appeared from jail. Andrea addresses Court and requests signature bonds in both cases with no abusive contact provisions. Court notes bond in 15CF329 has been satisfied. Court modifies bond. Attys to check with JA to see if 15CF371 has been administratively transferred to SRN. If so, Court will modify bond in that case to no abusive contact.

Apprs: CO: TCH, Rpr: TAPE, Clerk: Rohan. ADA: Michael Edward Nieskes DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea DF:  Rickie Lamont Wade appeared from jail. Case called at 11:05 a.m. S/T Officer Jents. ADA Nieskes directs. Cross by Atty. Andrea. Atty. Arguments. Court finds probable cause and binds the DE over for trial. ADA files info. Atty. Andrea files substitution request. Atty. Andrea notes request for bond modification is forthcoming, defendant is currently on a probation hold. Court Orders bond to continue. and   _X_ SIGNATURE BOND:   _X_ Defendant guarantees compliance with the terms of this bond by pledging $1500.00 and understands that if the defendant does not comply with the terms of this bond, the bond will be forfeited and the defendant and/or surety may be ordered to pay the amount of the bond.


-It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations,  Jona H.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

-Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.
